history.proof: intros d a b Hd Hd2. unfold divides in Hd, Hd2. destruct Hd as [q Hq]. destruct Hd2 as [q0 Hq0]. exists (q + q0). rewrite Hq, Hq0. rewrite Nat.mul_add_distr_l. reflexivity.

original: intros d a b Hd Hd2. unfold divides in Hd, Hd2. destruct Hd as [q Hq]. destruct Hd2 as [q0 Hq0]. exists (q + q0). rewrite Hq, Hq0. rewrite Nat.mul_add_distr_l. reflexivity.
